meanings.sent1: The nonlevel ground made it hard to set up the tent.
meanings.sent2: The nonlevel floor caused the ball to roll in unexpected directions.
meanings.sent3: The nonlevel sidewalk made it feel like we were walking on a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent4: Her nonlevel haircut gave her a unique and edgy look.
meanings.sent5: The nonlevel terrain was a challenge for the hikers, but they enjoyed the adventure.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to a standard or norm.
meanings.sent1: His nonlevel approach to problem-solving often led to creative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The nonlevel response from the audience surprised the performers.
meanings.sent3: The nonlevel fashion choices at the party made for interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: Her nonlevel thinking outside the box brought fresh perspectives to the team.
meanings.sent5: The nonlevel test results raised questions about the accuracy of the measurements.
